net.acomputerdog.BlazeLoader.util

Class BLLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.acomputerdog.BlazeLoader.util.BLLogger

  • public class BLLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    Customized logger for use with BlazeLoader and Mods. Tagged with a name specified by the creator of the logger. Sample output: [Test Mod][INFO] This is BLLogger.logInfo(). [UNKNOWN][FATAL] The chat monitor thread has died unexpectedly! [TPSMonitor][WARNING] The game tick rate has dropped below 50%! [Awesome Logger of Awesomeness!] I'm Awesome!

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String name
      Name used to tag this logger's output.
      protected java.lang.Object owner
      Object that is the owner of this BLLogger.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BLLogger(java.lang.Object owner)
      Creates a new BLLogger.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void log(java.lang.String message)
      Prints out a message in the format [{name}]{message}/n.
      void logDebug(java.lang.String message)
      Prints out a message in the format [{name}][DEBUG] {message}/n.

      Prints out a message in the format [{name}][DETAIL] {message}/n.

      Prints out a message in the format [{name}][ERROR] {message}/n.

      Prints out a message in the format [{name}][FATAL] {message}/n.

      Prints out a message in the format [{name}][INFO] {message}/n.
      void logRaw(java.lang.String message)
      Prints out a message in the format [{name}] {message}/n.

      • owner

        protected java.lang.Object owner

    • Constructor Detail

      • BLLogger

        public BLLogger(java.lang.Object owner)
        Creates a new BLLogger.
        Parameters:
        owner - The Object that created this BLLogger. Used to tag output. Object.getClass().getSimpleName() will be used unless owner is one of: null -> "UNKNOWN" Mod -> Mod.getModName() String -> will use string
